passive.description: Gains 1 stack of Natural Armor every 5s, stacking up to 4 times. Each stack increases Damage Resistance by 8%. 1 stack is lost for each instance of damage taken.

basicAttacks.description: [Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage. Throws an [Evil Seed] after 5 Basic Attacks.Throws an Evil Seed at the target location, creating athorn zone that lasts 5s. The zone deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Magic Damage every second to up to 5 enemies andreduces their Movement Speed by 25%.

Basic Attacks become [Soothing Mist].Releases Soothing Mist in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to enemies hit, whileapplying 1 stack of [Recovery] to allies.[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking upto 3 times.HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks: [Healing Rate: 12%] | [Healing Rate: 18%] | [Healing Rate: 24%]

Basic Attacks become [Healing Seed].Throws a healing seed at the target location that blooms,healing nearby allies for [Healing Rate: 66%] HP andapplying 1 stack of [Recovery][Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking upto 3 times.HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks: [Healing Rate: 12%] | [Healing Rate: 18%] | [Healing Rate: 24%]

commonSkills.description: After a brief delay, creates an entangling zone lasting 4s.Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every secondand immobilizes enemies that enter for 1.5s.
Creates an energizing aura around the caster, lasting 5 seconds. Restores [Healing Rate: 39%] HP and 6 MP every second to up to 10 nearby allies.

Applies Vitality Seeds to up to 5 nearby allies, healing for [Healing Rate: 96%] HP and applying 1 stack of[Recovery].Vitality Seeds increase Cast Speed by 40% andAttack Speed by 25% for 6s.[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking upto 3 timesHP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks: [Healing Rate: 12%] | [Healing Rate: 18%] | [Healing Rate: 24%]

Releases restorative energy at the target location, healingallies. Healing amount increases based on target's[Recovery] stacks.[Recovery] stacks: 0|1 |2|3Recovers HP: [Healing Rate: 90%] | [Healing Rate: 114%] | [Healing Rate: 138%] | [Healing Rate: 162%]

Cleanses all Hard Control (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup,Petrify, Sleep), Silence, and 2 DoT effects on the casterand up to 20 nearby allies. Also heals for [Healing Rate: 72%] HP, applies 1 stack of [Recovery], and prevents thenext 3 Hard Control or Silence effects. The effect lasts 4s.Can be used while skills are disabled.[Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking upto 3 times.HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks [Healing Rate: 12%] | [Healing Rate: 18%] | [Healing Rate: 24%]

skills.description: Creates 3 explosions in the target area. Each explosion deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to players([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs). The caster is healed for [Healing Rate: 72%] HP if at least one enemy is hit.

Grants Thorn Barrier to up to 5 nearby allies.Thorn Barrier increases Damage Resistance by 20%, Cast Speed by 40% andAttack Speed by 25% for 6s.When taking direct damage, recovers [Healing Rate: 66%]HP up to 6 times; also Slows the attacker by 25% for 3s.

Creates a Rain of Serenity at the target location for 8s.Allies in the rain gain 25% Damage Resistance and recover [Healing Rate: 30%] HP every second. Deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage to enemies in the field every 1 second
Creates a Healing Bloom aura around the caster. Allies within gain 15% increased Healing Received. Consumes 3 MP every second to restore [Healing Rate: 27%] HP to nearby allies.

Launches Root Worms in the target direction. Uponhitting an enemy target, it will bounce to other enemytargets within 7 meters up to 9 times. Each target can behit a maximum of 3 times.Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic DamageStuns the target for 1s, and reduces damage dealt by 20% for 9s.

Inflicts natural toxins on the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage every 1 second while reducing Attack Speed by 30% and Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. The toxin's duration is refreshed whenever the target takes damage from the caster's Weapon Skills.

Heals allies along the path for [Healing Rate: 210%] HP, purifies all Crowd Control effects and 5 stacks of Damage over Time, grants Immunity to Damage over Time and increases Healing Received by 35% for 6 seconds.

Plants a Divine Rootfall that lasts 20s. After 1s, the treematures and restores [Healing Rate: 24%] HP everysecond to nearby allies. When enemies cast skills inrange, it shoots sleep seeds that deal [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and inflict Sleep for 2.5s. The tree is destroyed after taking 10 Basic Attack hits
